title.rendered: “New Changes in IDF’s Home Front Command Defense Policy: Resuming Educational Activities Nation-Wide”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

Changes in the Home Front Command’s defense policy

After an assessment of the situation, it was decided that as of today (Monday) at 00:00, a change in the Home Front Command’s defense policy will be implemented.

As part of the changes, it was decided to resume educational activities across the country. In the confrontation line and Gaza envelope areas, educational activities will be allowed, subject to restrictions. Additionally, restrictions on assembly in areas under green policy have been lifted.

Attached is the Home Front Command’s defense policy: https://IDFANC.activetrail.biz/ANC15042024974974380347

Continue to follow the instructions published by the Home Front Command through official distribution channels. The complete instructions are updated on the National Emergency Portal and the Home Front Command app.
